definition: to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: A city of northern poland near the mouth of the vistula .
sentences.chinese: 波蘭北部一城市，位於維斯杜拉河入海口。

sentences.english: The city straddles the river Glomma where it meets the North Sea.
sentences.chinese: 這座城市格洛馬河它位於的入海口。

sentences.english: Two river entrances to the sea, one in the east, one in the west, across four longitudes.
sentences.chinese: 兩個入海口，一東一西，跨越四個經度。

sentences.english: My mission was to travel the length of the Amazon, from source to mouth.
sentences.chinese: 我計劃走完亞馬遜河全程，從源頭一直到入海口。

sentences.english: We live near the Thames estuary.
sentences.chinese: 我們的住處靠近泰晤士河入海口。

sentences.english: Nutrients arrive in estuaries from both the land and the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 從陸地和海洋來的營養成分到達入海口。

sentences.english: The results showed Licun river estuaries were more seriously polluted.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，李村河入海口綜合污染最爲嚴重。

definition: Nananqu district of central Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
